Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class BuildDomeEverywhere

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.DivinityDecoratorWithEffects
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.BuildDomeEverywhere
All Implemented Interfaces:
Divinity
public class BuildDomeEverywhere
extends DivinityDecoratorWithEffects
Atlas is able to build a dome instead of a regular block during his build phase, complying with the basic rules of Worker.build(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Tile)

    void updatePossibleActions​(java.util.List<Action> possibleActions)

      public java.util.List<ModelUpdate> build​(Board board, Worker selectedWorker, Tile selectedTile)
